item.description:
I work a few doors down and love the aroma seeping thru my window.

Heard positive remarks and the place is unique and friendly one of a kind place.
Lets give t our own rating...

They do not have their brunch menu online yet since they just open three months ago.

Their chief use to work at Soundbite Cafe.

If you need a menu email me will send.
I believe in supporting small start up places like myself..

Otherwise lets go with the flow relax and enjoy.
Price ranges from $6.00 to 15.00 for brunch.

Make sure you bring enough cash for food and tip.
Please be on time if running late let me know call me on my cell 646-220-5707 if running late.

Thanks
Jo-Ann.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at Ball Square Cafe & Breakfast in - Somerville
